description: StyleNest is a premium e-commerce fashion platform offering a curated selection of clothing for men, women, and kids.

categories.men: Men's fashion including shirts, pants, jackets, and accessories
categories.women: Women's fashion including dresses, tops, skirts, pants, and accessories

shopping_cart.description: Add products to cart and checkout seamlessly
shopping_cart.note: Your cart items are saved even after logout and will be restored when you login again

wishlist.description: Save your favorite products to wishlist for later
wishlist.how_to_use: Login to your account, then click the wishlist button on product pages or in the navbar to manage your wishlist

features.user_accounts: Create account, login, and manage your profile

forgot_password.how_to_use: Click 'Forgot Password?' on the login page, enter your email, and you'll receive a reset link
forgot_password.note: Check your email inbox for the password reset link

promo_codes.description: Apply discount codes at checkout for savings
promo_codes.how_to_use: Enter promo code in the cart page before checkout

orders.description: View and manage all your orders
features: View order history with status tracking
See payment details and order items
Download PDF invoices for your orders
Rate and review your completed orders
Track order status (Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered)
Download PDF invoices from My Orders page
Invoices automatically sent to your registered email after purchase
Includes order details, items, pricing, and payment information

ratings_and_reviews.description: Rate your orders and share your experience
ratings_and_reviews.how_to_use: Go to My Orders, click 'Rate Order' button on any completed order
ratings_and_reviews.optional_review: You can optionally write a detailed review along with your rating
